directions: Whisk oil and lemon juice in large bowl; season with salt and pepper. Add lettuce, garbanzo beans, cheese, tomato, and onion; toss to coat.
Using tongs, turn pitas over gas flame or in broiler to char slightly, about 15 seconds per side. Pull each open, spread with tapenade, and fill with salad.
ingredients: 1 tomato, cored, cut into thin wedges
7-inch-diameter pita breads, cut in half to make 4 semicircles
title: Grab-and-Go Greek Sandwiches
